free_text.Content: [b]MATLAB & GNU Octave:[/b][br/][li] variables, types, workspace, operators (arithmetic, relational, logical) and basic functions (mathematical, logical...)[br/][li] series/vectors, arrays, array operators and functions, logical indexing, manipulation of character strings, N-D arrays, records, cells arrays[br/][li] management of dates and time, time series[br/][li] data visualization: 2D and 3D graphics, properties (handle graphics), animation and movies[br/][li] Matlab/Octave programming (M-files) : control structures (for, while, if, switch, try), scripts versus functions, user interaction, errors and warning management, GUI, debugging[br/][li] formatted input/output, file manipulation[br/][br/][b]Python:[/b][br/][li] basics of Python language, manipulation of numeric data (NumPy), scientific computing (SciPy), 2D plots (MatPlotLib), 3D vizualisation (Mayavi)[br/][br/]
